alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Fergus County below 4500ft; Gates of the Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Snowy and Judith Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 03 at 1:11PM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains, Snowy and Judith Mountains, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass, Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Cascade County below 5000ft, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Fergus County below 4500ft, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap, and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest wind gusts are expected between 9pm and 3am.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
